messages.body: $AAPL The mobile peer-to-peer payment services sector continues to grow by leaps and bounds. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-pay-gets-best-of-payment-service-category/

links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Pay Gets "Best of Payment Service Category" Review from Consumer Reports
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) mobile peer-to-peer payment service was just put to the test alongside other competitors by Consumer Reports. Apple Pay received high marks across the board and finished at the top of the class. Consumer Reports has the details on Apple's review.

links.title: 'Use extreme caution,' data expert Nick Colas warns as S&P 500 plans a massive tech shift
links.description: The S&P 500 is about to undergo a major structural change that may alter which technology stocks you own. Facebook and Google's parent Alphabet will move out of the index's technology sector and to a newly formed communication services sector in about six weeks.
